snippet: A federal judge in Cincinnati has allowed a lawsuit by 10 Tea Party groups to move forward against the Internal Revenue Service.
abstract: Federal judge allows lawsuit by 10 Tea Party groups to move forward against Internal Revenue Service, rejecting request by federal government to dismiss all allegations that the agency subjected conservative groups to additional scrutiny.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Cincinnati has allowed a lawsuit by 10 Tea Party groups to move forward against the Internal Revenue Service.
